alert.note: Alert for Banks; Hall; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 1:25PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Banks, eastern Hall and Jackson Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 125 PM EDT, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from near Raoul to near Gillsville to near Hoschton, and moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Commerce, Homer, Braselton, Lula, Maysville, Arcade, Nicholson, Hoschton, Pendergrass, Gillsville, Talmo, Candler, Bear Creek Reservoir, Peach State Speedway, Pinefield Crossroads, Road Atlanta-Lanier Speedway, Apple Valley, Hollingsworth, and Banks Crossing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
